orders.description: The `orders` table stores information about individual items within an order, including pricing, discounts, and product details.

id.description: Unique identifier for each order record (primary key)

company_code.description: Code identifying the company associated with the order

source_store_key.description: Identifier for the store where the order originated

source_store_name.description: Name of the store where the order originated

order_created_time_07.description: Timestamp when the order was created

order_finished_time_07.description: Timestamp when the order was completed (can be null)

order_id.description: Unique identifier for the order (must be unique across all orders)

order_return_id.description: Identifier for any associated return order

created_by.description: Identifier or name of the user who created the order

channel_code.description: Code identifying the sales channel used for the order

customer_phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the customer

price_rule_order_title.description: Title of any pricing rule applied to the order (can be null)

special_order_type.description: Indicates if the order is of a special type (can be null)

reason.description: Reason for the order or any special conditions

discount_code_order.description: Discount code applied to the entire order (can be null)

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer who placed the order

price_rule_order_id.description: Identifier for the pricing rule applied to the order (can be null)

total.description: Total amount of the order before discounts

total_after_discount.description: Total amount of the order after applying discounts

total_discount_amount.description: Total amount of discounts applied to the order

order_amount_after_discount.description: Final order amount after all discounts

attributed_source_store_key.description: Key of the store attributed to the sale (can be null)

attributed_channel_code.description: Code of the channel attributed to the sale (can be null)

order_lines.description: The `order_lines` table stores information about individual items within an order, including pricing, discounts, and product details.

id.description: Unique identifier for each order line record (primary key)

order_line_id.description: Unique identifier for the order line (must be unique across all order lines)

order_id.description: Identifier for the order to which the order line belongs

price_rule_order_line_title.description: Title of any pricing rule applied to the order line (can be null)

discount_code_order_line.description: Discount code applied to the order line (can be null)

variant_id.description: Identifier for the product variant associated with the order line

quantity.description: Number of items in the order line

price_rule_order_line_id.description: Identifier for the pricing rule applied to the order line (can be null)

tax_line.description: Tax amount for the order line

product_amount_after_discount.description: Amount of the product after applying discounts

net_amount_no_vat.description: Net amount of the product without VAT

price_in_order.description: Price of the product in the order

customers.description: The `customer` table stores comprehensive information about customers, including their personal details, contact information, geographical location, and classification within the system.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for each customer (primary key)

customer_code.description: A code assigned to the customer, possibly for internal reference

created_date_07.description: The date when the customer record was created

group_id.description: Identifier for the customer group (can be null)

group_name.description: Name of the customer group (can be null)

level_id.description: Identifier for the customer's level or tier (can be null)

level_name.description: Name of the customer's level or tier (can be null)

type_id.description: Identifier for the customer type (can be null)

type_name.description: Name of the customer type (can be null)

status.description: Current status of the customer (can be null)

country.description: Customer's country of residence (can be null)

city.description: Customer's city of residence (can be null)

district.description: District within the city where the customer resides (can be null)

ward.description: Smaller administrative division where the customer resides (can be null)

full_address.description: Complete address of the customer (can be null)

eligible_for_contact.description: Boolean indicating whether the customer can be contacted for marketing or other purposes (can be null)
